channel.title: Comments on: Strange Redbox Password Policy

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: Totally agree. Redbox is the one password that I'm constantly forgetting. Having such a limited number of characters available makes it a challenge not only to use my typical password algorithm, but it also makes it more likely to be hacked. Boo!
item.content:encoded: Totally agree. Redbox is the one password that I’m constantly forgetting. Having such a limited number of characters available makes it a challenge not only to use my typical password algorithm, but it also makes it more likely to be hacked. Boo!

item.title: By: Chris Wiegman
item.dc:creator: Chris Wiegman
item.description: Good catch! I've had services tell me storage is an issue here before which sends me running as, well, that's what hashes are for....
item.content:encoded: Good catch! I’ve had services tell me storage is an issue here before which sends me running as, well, that’s what hashes are for….

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/03/13/strange-redbox-password-policy/#comment-4005">utahcon</a>.
Would be great to see them fix this.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to utahcon.

Would be great to see them fix this.

item.title: By: utahcon
item.dc:creator: utahcon
item.description:
Joseph
I just sent an email to Scott at Redbox (their API lead) to have him look at your post and address this as it will certainly be a growing concern for the tech community.
Thanks for being on top of these things!
item.content:encoded:
Joseph

I just sent an email to Scott at Redbox (their API lead) to have him look at your post and address this as it will certainly be a growing concern for the tech community.

Thanks for being on top of these things!
